about.title: Welcome to the Jungle !(★ ω ★)
about.intro: Welcome to the world of HappyWilderness, where fantasy meets fashion and every piece is a unique expression of originality and creativity.
about.team: Four different creative personalities, each completely different, have come together to offer you a diverse spectrum of designs and ideas that will captivate you and your surroundings. You'll become a source of inspiration for others.
about.philosophy: We believe that fashion should be more than just clothing - it should be an expression of your unique style and values. That's why we strive to create products that not only look great but also have a story.

originality.title: Originality
originality.description: Every design is unique and created with attention to detail.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use only premium materials that are comfortable to wear and last long.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: On-demand production means minimal waste and an eco-friendly approach.

about.story: If you've ever been to a magical place, you know very well that the magic of that place isn't just in its physical presence but in how it becomes a part of you and creates a connection within you, so you can return to it in your thoughts anytime and experience that enchantment over and over again. For this reason, we decided to create HappyWilderness to pass on a piece of this magic to you and help you create an extraordinary place from your own home where you'll feel happy and fulfilled.
about.quote: We believe that fashion should be more than just clothing - it should be an expression of your unique style and values.

footer.about_text: Original clothing with artistic prints. Each piece is custom-made to your requirements.
footer.made_with_love: Made with ❤️ in the Czech Republic. Powered by Next.js and Printful.
